Description: A fungal disease that causes brown spots on leaves.
Why it occurred: Caused by the fungus Bipolaris oryzae.
Prevention measures: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overwatering, and rotate crops.
Recommended steps to cure the disease: Apply a fungicide such as tricyclazole or propiconazole.
